name: Siamese Systems
overview:
Siamese Systems delivers mobile software centered around Photo Annotation & Information and Process Integrity. Our applications have valuable commercial application in Law Enforcement, Insurance, Security, Inspection and beyond.

Here are a few examples of our solutions for Law Enforcement Agencies:

MobileCSI is the first in its class, tablet-based crime scene documentation tool. The application transcends both human and animal crime and is being used globally by federal, state/provincial and local law enforcement personnel. Please visit us on the web to learn more about our solutions.

MobileForensics is the first in its class, tablet-based forensics tool that allows the Forensic Analyst to photograph evidence, annotate the sub sampled area in real time, and take multiple photographs that display on a single canvas. The application transcends both human and animal crime and is being used globally by federal, state/provincial and local Law Enforcement Crime Laboratories.

Why Siamese Solutions? We are laser focused on delivering simplified solutions that take old archaic process and reengineer using mobile technology to create immense productivity gains, data bound by integrity & new spokes in your organization’s GREEN strategy!

Ask us how we can bring you down a path of true e-productivity today!
